tiles.title: Getting Started
tiles.subTitle: Tap the pencil icon anywhere on your screen to start drawing. Use the back button to exit the app.

tiles.title: Delete Drawings
tiles.subTitle: Drag the pencil icon to bin icon to remove it from any screen.

tiles.title: Drawing Tools
tiles.subTitle: Choose from pen, eraser, shapes (circle, square, line), adjust brush size, and pick any color you want.

tiles.title: Share Your Drawings
tiles.subTitle: Tap the share icon to capture and share your artwork with friends on any app.

tiles.title: Video Tutorial
tiles.subTitle: Click here to watch our quick tutorial to learn all the features and tips.
